name: Flood
description: Area experiences regular flooding during heavy rains or storm surge

name: Rain-Induced Landslide
description: Landslides caused by heavy rainfall and saturated soil

name: Earthquake-Induced Landslides
description: Landslides triggered by seismic activity and ground shaking

name: Soil Erosion
description: Erosion of surface soils and topsoil from water and wind movement

name: Drought / Soil Movement
description: Dry spell conditions causing soil shrinkage, cracking, and settlement

name: Storm Surge
description: Coastal flooding from tropical cyclones and strong winds

name: Sea Level Rise
description: Coastal areas affected by rising sea levels

name: Ground Shaking
description: Seismic activity and earthquake ground motion

name: Tsunami
description: Large ocean waves caused by underwater earthquakes or landslides

name: Ash Fall
description: Volcanic ash accumulation from nearby active volcanoes

name: Typhoons
description: Strong tropical cyclones with high winds, heavy rain, and debris impact
